00023 #ifndef MEMORY_HPP
00024 #define MEMORY_HPP
00025 
00026 #include "typedefs.hpp"
00027 
00028 namespace uStreamLib {
00032         class US_API_EXPORT Memory {
00033         public:
00037                 typedef void*(*MemFunc)(void* dst, const void* src, size_t size);
00038 
00042                 static void benchmark(void);
00043 
00047                 static void benchmark(uint32 size, uint32 i_count);
00048 
00056                 static void* memCopy(void* dst, void* src, size_t size)
00057                 {
00058                         void* retval = NULL;
00059 
00060                         if (size <= 1000000)
00061                                 retval = _bestFuncSmall(dst, src, size);
00062                         else if (size > 1000000 && size <= 2000000)
00063                                 retval = _bestFunc1M(dst, src, size);
00064                         else if (size >= 2000000)
00065                                 retval = _bestFunc2M(dst, src, size);
00066 
00067                         return retval;
00068                 }
00069         private:
00070                 /* registered copy function names count */
00071                 enum { _MEMORY_FNAME_SIZE = 50 };
00072 
00073                 /* pointer to best copy function for < 1M */
00074                 static MemFunc _bestFuncSmall;
00075 
00076                 /* pointer to best copy function for 1M : 2M */
00077                 static MemFunc _bestFunc1M;
00078 
00079                 /* pointer to best copy function for > 2M */
00080                 static MemFunc _bestFunc2M;
00081 
00082                 /* best function's name */
00083                 static char _bestFuncName[_MEMORY_FNAME_SIZE];
00084         };
00085 }
00086 
00087 #endif
